name: Tiger Attack
overview: Tiger Attack is a one or two player game. Once the game has loaded use the SELECT key to switch between the number of players and joysticks. Pressing the OPTION key toggles the music on and off. Press the joystick Fire button or the START key to begin the game. Pressing SELECT during the game pauses the game, hitting SELECT a second time restarts. Hitting START during the game returns to the title screen. Pressing the joystick fire button shoots, pushing the joystick forward while holding the fire button down drops a smart bomb, destroying any enemies on the screen at the time
